mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(surveyno, memberno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES (survey_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{topic}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{s_number}, #{is_continue}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, memberno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno DESC
SELECT surveyno, memberno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM survey WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY surveyno DESC

SELECT surveyno, memberno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM survey WHERE is_continue = #{is_continue, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY surveyno DESC OFFSET #{startRow} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM survey WHERE (#{is_continue} IS NULL OR #{is_continue} = '' OR is_continue = #{is_continue})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT surveyno, memberno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY surveyno DESC) AS rnum FROM survey WHERE (#{is_continue} = '' OR is_continue LIKE '%' || #{is_continue} || '%') ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
